title: Paul comics identification
content:
[http://forbiddenplanet.co.uk/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/09/Paul%20Goes...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054750/http:/forbiddenplanet.co.uk/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/09/Paul%20Goes%20Fishing%20Michel%20Rabagliati.jpg "http://forbiddenplanet.co.uk/blog/wp-content/uploads/2008/09/Paul%20Goes%20Fishing%20Michel%20Rabagliati.jpg")

Does anyone know what the font for Paul goes fishing is?  
Thanks a million!
author: beclam

comments.content:
What makes you think it’s a font?  
Looks handwritten to me. :-\
The two S’s don’t match. I’m guessing handwritten as well.

ah...Michel Rabagliati! unfortunately didn’t win the Eisner Award.  
great book/story; and great lettering by Dirk Rehm.
